Text.Value: Investigation.
I'm just curious about what's inside it.
Thievery.
Allow yourself to be taken to prison.
They're all wrong. Now go and be somewhere else.
Not this one you won't. Now piss off.
I was merely taking a stroll and happened to wander by.
Someone got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
Why are you talking to me when you have a whole barn to explore?
Thought I would've noticed some explosive teddy bears lying around - guess not. Well done, I suppose.
Could be anything, couldn't it? Now off you pop.
What...? Well, here's a word for you: manip. Come on - let's go and see him.
Give me one good reason why you're here - preferably in one word or less.
Attack before he raises the alarm.
Yeah, I bet. Shoo.
Oh look, it's the barn enthusiast.
At least you're honest. The manip'll deal with you.
Gods, imagine if a kid had gotten hold of one of those bears...

EditorData.NodeContext: Genuinely concerned in his own gruff way

Text.Value: Barn.
They let you into the barn? Well, try not to get overexcited.
Why not? I quite like barns.
Leave.
Thinking of trying to get into this barn? Don't.
Right, off to the manip with you.
You like this barn a bit too much, don't you? I think you need to calm down in the cells.

Synopsis: A short dialog for the flaming fist guarding a back door of the Big Barn which holds donations for the refugees. Same dialog will be used in a case of this flaming fist catching the player inside the barn.
